Package my.uum

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
my.uum.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class is for managing the sqlite database.

    • registerCafe

      public void registerCafe(String email, String ofNum, String mobNum, String cafeName, String inasisName, String locLink, String openTime, String closeTime, String holStatus)
      Registers a cafe with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      email - the email associated with the cafe admin
      ofNum - the office telephone number of the cafe
      mobNum - the mobile telephone number of the cafe
      cafeName - the name of the cafe
      inasisName - the name of the inasis
      locLink - the location link of the cafe
      openTime - the opening time of the cafe
      closeTime - the closing time of the cafe
      holStatus - the holiday status of the cafe

      role - the role of the user
      chatId - the chat ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is logged in successfully, false otherwise

      This method is to insert user's rating and comment of a specific food into the database
      Parameters:
      rating - rating of the user
      comment - comment of the user
      foodID - food ID that the user rates and comments for
      chatId - chat id of the user rating and commenting the food

      rating - rating of the user
      comment - comment of the user
      foodID - food ID that the user rates and comments for
      chatId - chat id of the user rating and commenting the food

      public boolean hasRatedFood(String chat_id, String food_id)
      This method is to check the if the user has rated and commented the specific food before
      Parameters:
      chat_id - chat ID of the user rating and commenting the food
      food_id - food ID that the user rates and comments for
      Returns:
      boolean value true if the food has been rated by the chat, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • sortFoodList

      public ArrayList<String> sortFoodList(String columnName)
      This method is to display sort all the food available in the database based on price, ratings or food type
      Parameters:
      columnName - name of the column in database (e.g. price, rating) which decide how the food should be sorted
      Returns:
      an ordered ArrayList of Strings consisting all the food available.

    • getBestFood

      public ArrayList<String> getBestFood(String firstFoodId, String secondFoodId)
      This method is to compare two food based on their price and rating with a score rubric ((AVG(COALESCE(r.rating, 0)) / 5.0) + ((MAX(f.price) - f.price) / MAX(f.price)))
      Parameters:
      firstFoodId - food id of the first food selected
      secondFoodId - food id of the second food selected
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Strings representing the details of the best food.
